dct_title_s: The map, Kigali : packed with over 500 points, 150 recommendations, 70 expert tips, and a whole lot of love!
dct_description_sm: Some buildings shown pictorially. Panel title. At bottom of panel: Kigali Guides, www.livinginkigali.com, www.mapofkigali.com. "Published January 2015 by Kigali Guides Ltd. Copyright Kirsty Henderson, January 2015." Includes text, illustrations, and descriptive indexes to stores, memorials, landmarks, and sports & recreation. Descriptive indexes to restaurants, bars and clubs, bakeries and cafés, and accommodations; lists of businesses at the Nyarugenge Market, the Kigali City Tower, and the Union Trade Center; and text, "Kinyarwanda basics," and illustrations on verso. Inset map: "Map of Rwanda." Maps on verso: Kacyiru -- [Town / Kiyovu] -- Kimihurura -- Nyarutarama -- Nyamirambo -- Remera.
